overview: This is the third episode of our gay Berlin Bedroom Reports. Filmed exclusively, as always, with real couples in their personal environments. This time around the focus is on masculine guys who like it on the rough side. 10 men, 5 couples, live and love together, and go wild for each other. This combination of turn on and tenderness is unique in the world of porn. Dick with a heart! Very authentic. Love is a hard on!
title: Berlin Privat 3
